name: Sailor Punch
description:
The following game is a non-profit fan game, all rights belong to their respective owners. Jojo's Bizarre Adventure is property of Hirohiko Araki, Viz Media. Sailor Moon is property of Naoko Takeuchi and Kodansha. Game sprites for both Jojo's Bizarre Adventure and Sailor Moon are property of Capcom, although we are uninformed to comment regarding their current license over these properties. 

An unlikely encounter between a Stardust Crusader and a Sailor Moon. A short "interactive comic" game. Submission for JoJo jam of March 2020.

Shoutouts to  draketrought, who although he didn't participate helped us prototype a few of our ideas before the jam.
